tool_description: Monitors the health and performance of shipping integrations, tracking API response times, error rates, and system connectivity.

check_carriers.description: Whether to check carrier API health

alert_threshold.description: Error rate percentage that triggers alerts

error_messages: Invalid alert threshold: Must be between 0 and 100.
Monitoring service unavailable: Unable to connect to monitoring infrastructure.
Insufficient permissions: Monitor does not have access to check all requested systems.
usage: Optionally specify which systems to check and set alert_threshold for error rate monitoring.

overall_health.description: Overall system health status: healthy, degraded, or critical

carrier_status.description: Health status for each carrier integration

alerts_triggered.description: List of active alerts and issues

response_times.description: Average response times for each integrated service
